achievements.name: Butcher of Blaviken
achievements.description: Kill at least 5 opponents in under 10 seconds.

achievements.name: Master Marksman
achievements.description: Kill 50 human and nonhuman opponents by striking them in the head with a crossbow bolt.

achievements.name: Passed the Trial
achievements.description: Finish the game on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Overkill
achievements.description: Make an opponent suffer from bleeding, poisoning and burning simultaneously. Do this 10 times.
